data.text:
SONIA AGARWAL

Name: Sonia Agarwal

Height: 5'6"

Sex: F

Date of Birth: 28 March , 1982.

Birthplace: Punjab, India

Eyes: Black

Hair: Black

Nationality: Indian

Religion: Christian

Personal/Family Values: Democrat

Complexion: Light Skinned

Body Type: Skinny

My Personality, Long-Term Goals, etc

I am 177 centimeters. I am looking to play around. I wish to have kids someday. Men like that I am a skinny chick. Men cannot get enough of my skinny body. I am just your average classical western chick.

I cook a lot of eggs. I eat Arabic food, it tastes good. South American food is greatest spicy. I enjoy it much. Alcohol makes me sick so I don't drink. Cigarette smoke makes me sick.

I believe in Christ.

Photography is my favorite pasttime. I am an animal breeder because I like seeing animals hump, LOL.

Her Favorites...Favorite Dish: Chicken Kabab

Favorite Place: Munnar and Ooty

My Favorite Music: Jazz, Acid rock

My Favorite Reads: Business Occupational, Short stories

My Favorite Movies: not a movie buff

Dream Character: A negative role

Favourite Hobbies: Collecting Stamps, Bird watching, Animal breeding, Astrology / Palmistry / Numer$"\√ê

My Sports / Fitness Activities: Football, Cricket

My Favorite Cuisine: Arabic, South American

My Preferred Dress Style: Classic western

Favorite Color: White

Favorite Actor: Kamal Hassan

Favorite Actress: Simran

Biography:

Sonia Agarwal started her career in a Kannada movie called chandu with sudeep. She has acted in several Telugu and Tamil movies since then.Sonia Agarwal whose cute smile has stolen the hearts of the kollywood people hails from Chandigarh, Punjab. Smile. Always Smile, is her policy. She was into modeling before entering into the cinema industry. When she was doing her plus2 she got an offer to act in a serial in Zee TV. Her entry to movies was through a Telugu film named "nee premake" and it was a great hit in Andhra. Sonia's definition for success is recognition for one's work and not recognition for money.. Her Tamil movie debut was Kadhal Kondein in 2003. She also believes that one cannot succeed in life without having an ambition. She is a hard working person and this has made her the heartthrob of all South Indian Movie lovers.On December 15, 2006 she married Tamil film director and brother of actor Danush, Selvaraghavan in Chennai.
